name: Grilled Chicken w/ Mediterranean Couscous Salad
description: Savory grilled chicken seasoned in a citrus soy marinade paired with a refreshing couscous salad full of bright vegetables like pickled red onion and cucumber.
ingredients: Marinated Chicken (soy sauce, orange juice, lime juice, avocado oil, green onion, garlic, brown sugar, spices), couscous, cucumber, tomato, pickled red onion (vinegar, salt, sugar), feta cheese, parsley, bell pepper

name: Pork Chop w/ Portobello Cream Sauce
description: Juicy pork chops simmered in a creamy portobello sauce, served alongside parmesan crusted cauliflower and hearty quinoa.
ingredients: Pork Chops, Portobello sauce (portobello mushroom, onion, heavy cream, parmeasean, chicken broth, spices), parmesan crusted cauliflower (parmesan, panko bread crumbs, olive oil, spices), quinoa

name: Korean Rice Bowl
description: Ground beef simmered in a robust Asian Sauce overtop a bed of white rice, topped with green onion and sesame seeds.
ingredients: Ground beef, white rice, onion, soy sauce, sesame oil, chili, garlic sauce, green onion, sesame seeds, spices
